1.name: Raider
1.flavourText:
No hunt is complete without
the gutting and the skinning.

2.name: Deadeye
2.flavourText:
A woman can change the world 
with a single, well-placed arrow.

3.name: Pathfinder
3.flavourText:
There are venoms and virtues aplenty in 
 the wilds, if you know where to look.
